name: Dodge Block (camlink7)
description:
Dodge Block is a game where you dodge red blocks falling from the sky.  If you get hit 5 or more times then you die.  The blocks slowly start falling faster as time goes on.  Get the highest score possible and have fun!

P.S. - This is my first game that I'm releasing to the public.  It is the second game I have made by myself.  Please don't be too harsh on the criticism, but feedback is appreciated. Thanks!
